tool_description: For importing schedules in XML/XLS format
name: Import Schedule
title: Import Schedule

api_list.name: graphQL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://import-schedule.p.rapidapi.com/graphql"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "import-schedule.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
